EnhancedContent:
Error: "We couldn't log on to the incoming (IMAP) server... check email /password ... etc..

- Can login with the same credentials on the web mail portal
- Tried almost all combinations of IMAP security, port settings etc.
- AOL referred me to Microsoft support...

Can't believe its so difficult... Yahoo, hotmail, etc is easy peasy... just AOL now...

Thanks for listening :)
Description:
Error: "We couldn't log on to the incoming (IMAP) server... check email /password ... etc..

Can't believe its so difficult... Yahoo, hotmail, etc is easy peasy... just AOL now...

Title: Unable to Activate My Aol in Outlook App
Author: tariq1
